## ğŸš€ Getting Started

1. **Fork the repository**
   ```bash
   # Click "Fork" button on GitHub
   ```

2. **Clone your fork**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/RxHtml.git
   cd RxHtml
   ```

3. **Install dependencies**
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

4. **Create a branch**
   ```bash
   git checkout -b fix/good-first-issue-[issue-number]
   ```

5. **Make your changes**
   - Follow the implementation hints above
   - Test your changes locally

6. **Run tests**
   ```bash
   npm test
   npm run lint
   ```

7. **Commit and push**
   ```bash
   git add .
   git commit -m "fix: [description of fix]"
   git push origin fix/good-first-issue-[issue-number]
   ```

8. **Open a Pull Request**
   - Go to your fork on GitHub
   - Click "Compare & pull request"
   - Fill out the PR template
   - Reference this issue: "Closes #[issue-number]"

## ğŸ’¬ Questions?

**Need help?** Don't hesitate to:

- Comment on this issue with questions
- Check the [documentation](https://github.com/kiransth77/RxHtml/tree/main/docs)
- Look at similar issues or PRs
- Read the [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/kiransth77/RxHtml/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)

**We're here to help!** This is a learning opportunity, and questions are encouraged. ğŸ‰

- `good first issue` - Great for newcomers
- `help wanted` - Community contributions welcome
